benchmark_details.name: HPLT (High Performance Language Technologies) language resources
benchmark_details.overview: A new massive multilingual dataset including both monolingual and bilingual corpora extracted from CommonCrawl and previously unused web crawls from the Internet Archive.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide massive high-quality datasets for language modeling and machine translation training, especially for medium to low-resource languages.

data.source: Web crawls from CommonCrawl and the Internet Archive
data.size: â‰ˆ5.6 trillion word tokens for monolingual data, 96 million aligned sentence pairs for bilingual data

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on extracted corpora counts.
methodology.interpretation: Higher counts indicate a larger corpus size and potentially more robust language modeling.
